level.text: The purpose of this section is to establish fees for the implementation of D.C. Law 7-49, the “Uniform Limited Partnership Act of 1987,” effective December 10, 1987 (hereinafter cited as the “Act”).
The following fees shall be assessed under the Act:
Certificate of good standing for limited partnership $18.00
Certified copy of limited partnership filing $20.00
Change of registered agent/transfer of reserved name
Certificate of good standing obtained at same time $2.00
Certified copy obtained at the same time $7.00
